TopicTitle: KSP RP forum server CPU usage exceeded.

Articles.Content:

This.
The only person who\'d actually know is Radion himself; looking at his stats, he probably won\'t be on for another 4 hours at least.

> The only person who\'d actually know is Radion himself; looking at his stats, he probably won\'t be on for another 4 hours at least.

I\'m just gonna boop this so that I get updates on it.

Ping, please don\'t bump threads. If you need notification on replies, use the subscribe feature.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

Didn\'t even see that. Well, I did, but I never read it and used some *seichl*-common sense.

I guess that is why I could not send in my test.

Does anybody have a blank copy I can use or should I just wait? Sort of afraid to lose the old Karkraz land claim :\'(

That is, if I pass the test.

any update radion

ps what will you do for servers?

ps i had a idea for 4 servers in different place incase 1 goes down

> 
> any update radion
> 
> ps what will you do for servers?
> 
> ps i had a idea for 4 servers in different place incase 1 goes down

I don\'t think four servers can share an URL, unless you have some complicated coding, that is too much for just a RP forum.
mady a vpn or proxy to a central server and another 'backup' server with another ulr(eg ksprp-backup.com)
So, do we have any news what-so-ever? Atm, we\'ve been given information of the forum being saved and being switched to a new host. Looks like the host was sorted yesterday, but nothing since then.
Radion still needs to get the hosting fully sorted out.

> 
> mady a vpn or proxy to a central server and another 'backup' server with another ulr(eg ksprp-backup.com)

But who has

a.) The time to code that.

b.) The skill to code that.

c.) The money for the servers.

d.) The time to maintain the servers.

Most websites don\'t have any sort of backup server, even government official websites, which tend to be crappy, by the way.

for a,b and d me!

for c my dad could lend us a server(propbely not )

Status Report - 

So far, I have received no word of confirmation from one of my two choices of webhosting. As such, I will moving the site to a hosting provider that will hopefully be much more stable. I will also be registering another domain name (as always, deregistering the old one to prevent confusion) in order to make sure things go down as smoothly as possible. I\'m doing the best I can here and still be able to handle other things.

I personally have a friend of 13 who has sold games that he has programmed himself to classmates.

On topic: Hope we can resolve this server problem soon.

I removed the posted EXE file and related posts.

If your project is KSP related, you may release it in the projects forum IF you provide the proper documentation for it as required in the guidelines of that forum.

Otherwise posting of programs is not appropriate and a security risk for everyone.

[mod]Do not post it again.[/mod]
